title: How to know if my URL is working - Quora

response.answer_text: Visit Website Planet.Fill in your website address (URL) on the field and press the Check button.Website Planet will show whether your website is online or not.All you need to do is follow these simple steps: Visit Website Planet. Fill in your website address (URL) on the field and press the Check button. Website Planet will show whether your website is online or not

Use Website Planet for URL testing it will tell you that your website is Up or down (Online or Offline) after that you can use search console to see that your website is registered on Google server or not.
